itemDisplayName: RDS farm deployment existing AD & custom image for RDSH machines
description: This template creates a RDS farm deployment using custom image for RDSH machines and using existing active directory in same resource group
summary: Creates RDS farm deployment using custom image for RDSH machines and using existing active directory in same resource group. It creates a vm for RDSH using custom image parameter value (number of RDSH vms are configurable). Then DSC resources configures the farm to be fully functional
